responses:
My name is Peggy, I'm a robot assistant made by the Pegasus development team.
What can I help you with?

Pegasus is a novel student group founded by the students of ITC of TEC CSN.
Thwy work with software and AI.

patterns: What do they do in Pegasus?
responses:
Mostly software projects with focus on artificial intelligence.
 In Pegasus we also impart programming courses and participate in bootcamps.
Most things related to software development and coding.

patterns: Where can I get more information?
responses: Take a look around. You'll find more about us here. You can also find us on social networks.

patterns: I want to enter the group.
I want to be a member.
What do I need to join?
responses:
Great! Just contact my makers. In the contacts tabs you will find their information.
 Pegasus is always in need of passionate hard-working members.
 I'm sure they might find a spot for you too!
